timeline.bodyText: I believe we are persisting the same account that was already persisted?
timeline.author: shahzaibj

replies.bodyText:
Yes, given that there might be any changes on the account object.
An alternative would be to check everything inside the stored account and see if anything changes, which, IMHO, I think it's an overkill and might not be easily sustainable.
replies.author: rpdome
